All About Weddings...

1.Have you ever thought about your wedding?: Yes. Ever hear that little girls dream of their weddings since their childhood? lol
2.Do you know what your dress will look like?: I don't have an exact picture of it but  maybe...tank style and had bead work on it but very simple....or a dress with thin spaghetti straps. I want it to be simple, yet elegant!
3.Do you know where you wanna get married?: I always thought St. Patricks Church but I'd actually like to get married on a beach. That would be pretty. Either or, I'll probably end up in St.Josephs Church. I hope its St. Patricks!!!
4. Big or Small Wedding?: probably in the middle. It depends upon how big my family is by then and how big my future husband's family is
5. Wedding Song?: Wow.. toughie...there are a lot of sweet ones...some old ones I'd consider would be "You Are So Beautiful"-Joe Crocker/"From This Moment On"-Shania Twain/"The Way You Look Tonight"-Frank Sinatra/"When A Man Loves A Woman"
6. Who is in your wedding?:well i would like  my sis to be my maid of honor. Casey is def in it, maybe a bridesmaid. Caity and Ally also. Jess S, Jess K, hmm, Kristina, I dont know excatly. those are just a few/
7. What part do they play in your wedding?: Nicole would  be the maid of honor.   caity and ally Casey, all the other girls as bridesmaids,depends upon who im really close with by then.
8. Pick a color for the dresses: Probably a light baby blueish color, a lavendar, or a light pale pink. They'd be carrying yellow or white roses...depending upon the dress color
9. Who is on the guest list?: LOL.. okay, once again, if I was getting married tomorrow.. Well, obviously the people above.. my mom, dad, all my aunts and uncles and cousins. kristen, christina, jess, alyssa f, karina  then my husbands family and friends
10. Whats your wedding color?: My wedding color?? I dunno. I like pastels.. like a pastel purple or pink. I think that would look nice.
11. Where would your honeymoon be?: Cancun, Mexico. Or someplace hot with a good beach
12. Oh yea, gotta groom in mind?: lol sure.
13.How many kids?: probably like 3 -6... i really  want 5
14. What month would you like to get married?: May! It's really pretty. :) I'd like to have a spring wedding. Or some point in June.
15. Would you have a live band or DJ:  definitely DJ
16. Do you feel better about getting married?: Um.. yea I guess....even though im only about 14 so I really shouldn't be worrying about this. =)
